description:
Create column AcademicLevelID at index 1 based on column Academic Level using expression grel:md5(
  value.trim()
       .toLowercase()
       .replace(/[áàäâ]/,"a")
       .replace(/[éèëê]/,"e")
       .replace(/[íìïî]/,"i")
       .replace(/[óòöô]/,"o")
       .replace(/[úùüû]/,"u")
       .replace(/[ÁÀÄÂ]/,"a")
       .replace(/[ÉÈËÊ]/,"e")
       .replace(/[ÍÌÏÎ]/,"i")
       .replace(/[ÓÒÖÔ]/,"o")
       .replace(/[ÚÙÜÛ]/,"u")
)
